com.brightcove.player.edge

Class OfflineStoreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.edge.OfflineStoreManager

  • public class OfflineStoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Store manager can be used to persist data into an application specific private database.

    • Field Summary

      The maximum of expressions allowed in the queries generation by this store.

      The maximum of variables allowed in the queries generation by this store.

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_SQL_VARIABLES

        public static final int MAX_SQL_VARIABLES
        The maximum of variables allowed in the queries generation by this store. Please note the actual limit imposed by Sqlite database is typically 999. However we set the limit to a lower value to give enough headroom for the requery library to manipulate the final query.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_SQL_EXPRESSIONS

        public static final int MAX_SQL_EXPRESSIONS
        The maximum of expressions allowed in the queries generation by this store. Please note the actual limit imposed by Sqlite database is typically 1000. However we set the limit to a lower value to give enough headroom for the requery library to manipulate the final query.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • refreshEntity

        public <T extends io.requery.Persistable> T refreshEntity(T entity)
        Refresh the given entity. This refreshes the already loaded properties in the entity. If no properties are loaded then the default properties will be loaded.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the expected type of the entity;
        Parameters:
        entity - reference to the entity to be refereshed.
        Returns:
        reference to the updated entity
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the entity does not exist in the store.

        true if the entity was found and updated, otherwise false.

      • markRequestSetForRemoval

        public boolean markRequestSetForRemoval(@NonNull
                                        java.lang.Long key)
        Marks the specified request set should be removed by the DownloadMonitorService. A request set that has been marked for removal will not queued or checked for further status changes. Any download requests in the set that has been queued already will be removed. The request set itself will be deleted automatically once all the requests have been removed.
        Parameters:
        key - the primary key of the request set to be updated.
        Returns:
        true if the entity was found and updated, otherwise false.

      • findDownloadsToBeQueued

        @NonNull
public java.util.List<com.brightcove.player.store.DownloadRequest> findDownloadsToBeQueued(int batchSize)
        Fetches a list of download requests that not have been queued for download by the DownloadManager.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a list of pending download requests.
